sense.name: An intermediate platform in a staircase.
sense.examples: Set the furniture on the landing for the time being. We built a landing into the staircase.

sense.name: Structure providing a place where boats can dock.
sense.examples: The boat finally came to settle at the landing. Build a landing at the edge of the Sound.

sense.name: The act of coming to rest after a voyage.
sense.examples: The boat landing will occur in the afternoon. The Space Shuttle will have its landing tomorrow.
